synopsis.text: Just as the taste of success was within reach, a dedicated salaryman's life is abruptly cut short. In a twist of fate, he is reborn into a magical realm known as Galdardia, as a young healer named Luciel. Determined to live a peaceful life and avoid the pitfalls of his previous existence, Luciel embarks on a journey to become a renowned healer. However, he quickly discovers that life as a healer in this new world is fraught with danger and prejudice. Undeterred, Luciel pushes himself to the limits, undergoing rigorous training to hone his magical abilities and physical strength. As he navigates through the challenges of his new life, Luciel's unwavering dedication and selfless nature earn him a reputation as a beacon of hope in the world of Galdardia. Will Luciel's resilience and determination be enough to overcome the trials that lie ahead and secure the peaceful life he yearns for?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
